functions.name: glps_audio_stream_destroy
functions.description: Destroys audio manager and releases all resources

functions.name: glps_audio_stream_stop
functions.description: Initializes a new audio manager instance

functions.name: glps_thread_attr_destroy
functions.brief: Destroys a thread attribute object.

functions.name: glps_thread_attr_getdetachstate
functions.brief: Gets the detach state of a thread attribute.

functions.name: glps_thread_attr_setdetachstate
functions.brief: Sets the detach state of a thread attribute.

functions.name: glps_thread_cond_broadcast
functions.brief: Broadcasts a condition variable. Wakes up all threads waiting on the condition variable.

functions.name: glps_thread_cond_destroy
functions.brief: Destroys a condition variable.

functions.name: glps_thread_cond_signal
functions.brief: Signals a condition variable. Wakes up one thread waiting on the condition variable.

functions.name: glps_thread_cond_wait
functions.brief: Waits on a condition variable. Unlocks the given mutex and blocks until the condition variable is signaled. The mutex is automatically re-acquired before returning.

functions.name: glps_thread_detach
functions.brief: Detaches a thread. Marks the thread as detached so its resources are automatically released upon termination.

functions.name: glps_thread_equal
functions.brief: Compares two threads for equality.

functions.name: glps_thread_exit
functions.brief: Exits the calling thread. Terminates the current thread and optionally provides a return value.

functions.name: glps_thread_join
functions.brief: Waits for a thread to terminate. Blocks the calling thread until the specified thread finishes execution.

functions.name: glps_thread_mutex_destroy
functions.brief: Destroys a mutex.

functions.name: glps_thread_mutex_lock
functions.brief: Locks a mutex. Blocks the calling thread until the mutex is acquired.

functions.name: glps_thread_mutex_trylock
functions.brief: Attempts to lock a mutex without blocking.

functions.name: glps_thread_mutex_unlock
functions.brief: Unlocks a mutex. Releases a previously acquired mutex.

functions.name: glps_thread_self
functions.brief: Returns the calling thread's handle.

functions.name: *glps_timer_init
functions.brief: Represents a high-resolution timer in GLPS.

functions.name: glps_timer_check_and_call
functions.brief: Checks if the timer has expired and calls the callback if it has.

functions.name: glps_timer_destroy
functions.brief: Destroys a timer and frees associated resources.

functions.name: glps_timer_elapsed_ms
functions.brief: Returns the elapsed time since the timer was started in milliseconds.

functions.name: glps_timer_elapsed_us
functions.brief: Returns the elapsed time since the timer was started in microseconds.

functions.name: glps_timer_start
functions.brief: Starts a timer with a specified duration and callback.

functions.name: glps_timer_stop
functions.brief: Stops a running timer.

functions.name: *glps_get_proc_addr
functions.brief: Returns the address of an OpenGL/Vulkan procedure.

functions.name: *glps_wm_get_display
functions.brief: Returns the X11 Display pointer.

functions.name: *glps_wm_init
functions.brief: Header file for the GLPS Window Manager. This module provides an abstraction for creating and managing windows, handling rendering contexts, input events, clipboard, drag & drop, and platform-specific operations for OpenGL and Vulkan.

functions.name: *glps_wm_window_get_native_ptr
functions.brief: Gets the native window pointer for a given window.

functions.name: glps_wm_cursor_change
functions.brief: Sets the callback for mouse movement events.

functions.name: glps_wm_destroy
functions.brief: Cleans up and destroys the GLPS Window Manager.

functions.name: glps_wm_get_fps
functions.brief: Starts a drag & drop operation.

functions.name: glps_wm_get_platform
functions.brief: Retrieves the platform identifier used by GLPS.

functions.name: glps_wm_get_window_count
functions.brief: Returns the total number of windows.

functions.name: glps_wm_set_window_background_transparent
functions.brief: Makes the window background transparent.

functions.name: glps_wm_set_window_blur
functions.brief: Retrieves the dimensions of a window.

functions.name: glps_wm_set_window_ctx_curr
functions.brief: Sets the OpenGL context of a window as the current context.

functions.name: glps_wm_set_window_opacity
functions.brief: Sets window opacity.

functions.name: glps_wm_should_close
functions.brief: Checks if any window should close.

functions.name: glps_wm_swap_buffers
functions.brief: Swaps the front and back buffers for a window.

functions.name: glps_wm_swap_interval
functions.brief: Sets the swap interval for buffer swaps.

functions.name: glps_wm_toggle_window_decorations
functions.brief: Checks if required extensions are available

functions.name: glps_wm_vk_create_surface
functions.brief: Creates a Vulkan surface for a window.

functions.name: glps_wm_vk_free_extensions_arr
functions.brief: Frees memory allocated by glps_wm_vk_get_extensions_arr()

functions.name: glps_wm_vk_get_extensions_arr
functions.brief: Retrieves available Vulkan instance extensions with proper memory management

functions.name: glps_wm_window_destroy
functions.brief: Destroys a window.

functions.name: glps_wm_window_is_resizable
functions.brief: Creates a new window.

functions.name: glps_wm_window_update
functions.brief: Updates a window (polls events, refreshes).

data_types.name: gthread_attr_t
data_types.description: typedef HANDLE gthread_t; /**< Thread handle type for Windows

data_types.name: gthread_attr_t
data_types.description: typedef pthread_t gthread_t; /**< Thread handle type for POSIX

data_types.name: gthread_cond_t
data_types.description: typedef int gthread_mutexattr_t; /**< Mutex attribute type (unused)

data_types.name: gthread_cond_t
data_types.description: typedef pthread_mutexattr_t gthread_mutexattr_t; /**< Mutex attribute type for POSIX

data_types.name: gthread_condattr_t
data_types.description: typedef CONDITION_VARIABLE gthread_cond_t; /**< Condition variable type for Windows

data_types.name: gthread_condattr_t
data_types.description: typedef pthread_cond_t gthread_cond_t; /**< Condition variable type for POSIX

data_types.name: gthread_mutex_t
data_types.description: typedef DWORD gthread_attr_t; /**< Thread attribute type for Windows

data_types.name: gthread_mutex_t
data_types.description: typedef pthread_attr_t gthread_attr_t; /**< Thread attribute type for POSIX

data_types.name: gthread_mutexattr_t
data_types.description: typedef CRITICAL_SECTION gthread_mutex_t; /**< Mutex type for Windows

data_types.name: gthread_mutexattr_t
data_types.description: typedef pthread_mutex_t gthread_mutex_t; /**< Mutex type for POSIX

data_types.name: gthread_t
data_types.brief: Cross-platform thread, mutex, and condition variable abstractions for GLPS. Provides a unified interface for threads, mutexes, and condition variables on Windows and POSIX platforms.

data_types.name: gthread_t
data_types.description: typedef int gthread_condattr_t; /**< Condition variable attribute type (unused)

data_types.name: glps_timer
data_types.brief: Represents a high-resolution timer in GLPS.

header_files.name: glps_thread.h
header_files.brief: Cross-platform thread, mutex, and condition variable abstractions for GLPS. Provides a unified interface for threads, mutexes, and condition variables on Windows and POSIX platforms. //

header_files.name: glps_window_manager.h
header_files.brief: Header file for the GLPS Window Manager. This module provides an abstraction for creating and managing windows, handling rendering contexts, input events, clipboard, drag & drop, and platform-specific operations for OpenGL and Vulkan.
